answers.answer: Its to check for protein in your urine (signs of pre eclampsia) and other things like that.
They test ur protein levels, and hcg levels, thsy can run cultures from it too... sometimes they drug test. Just depends.
Probably making sure you don't have any protein in your urine. If you did, it could be a sign of preeclampsia.
Thank you all. Was just worried. Because It's my first time.
Was just wondering which insurance covers breast pumps? I am insured with blue shield and I haven't asked yet, but I guess they don't, but  they?Anyway  sorry guys for the forget , forgot mistake.
You can buy a breast pump at kroger, walmart, meijer, basically anywhere that sells baby care products.

My insurance (BCBS of IL) covered a medela breast pump. Call and find out. Some states like IL and AL will cover 100%, some will cover 90%. You'll have to call and find out. I used a local company that filed my insurance claim for me. You'll need a prescription for a breast pump tho from your doctor.

question: The urine test conducted every month when you go for clinic , what is it that they test.. i don't understand it. On my online update I see results i can't explain. Anyone ever asked?
title: Forget to ask my Ob/Gyn
